name: ELUO - beta
description:
A classical styled 2d platformer game. Where you play has EULO. 

Three different levels/maps to play from, each having their own difficulty levels...

controls:

moving left : 'A' key or left arrow key 

moving right: 'D' key or right arrow key 

jump : Spacebar

NOTE: THIS IS A BETA VERSION. ALL THE MISSING AND REQUIRED FEATURES WILL BE ADDED LATER !!!!!!!!!

THIS IS AN INDIE PROJECT DEVELOPED BY MYSELF
